nodes.long_description:
**3D Coverage Everywhere**

- Almost every recognizable city on Earth is available in True 3D, so you are likely able to visit your own street in Immersive 3D + Street View

- Best 3D Earth quality on the market, enhanced with the **AI-powered ’Upscale 3D Imagery’** feature!

**Street View**

- UNCOMPRESSED 8k quality w/ the best rendering fidelity on the platform, offering every Google and **community** 360 imagery on Earth

**Multiplayer**

- Explore alongside your friends

**(Add-on) ChatGPT Integration: EarthQuest AI can**

- Naturally respond in YOUR OWN Language
- Visualize & understand your surroundings on Earth for any educational purpose or to simply give fun facts
- Teleport you anywhere on Earth when asked
- .. and much more

**Realistic Graphics**

- Realistic lighting based on the customizable day/night cycle
- Lifelike adaptive 'Fog' option

**Hand Tracking**

- Fly like a Superhero by pointing your index finger
- Rotate by doing a "Steering" gesture with your own hands

**Terrain Quality**

- 3D map quality can go much further than anything else on the platform and achieve realistic 3D by pushing the map quality to extreme detail with the best possible performance

**Comfort Settings**

- Comfort Options (Snap Turning / Flight Vignette) to prevent Motion Sickness
- Flight Input Remapping (Flight Controls Range from Simple to Cinematic Movement)

**Google Maps Integration**

- Auto / manual zoom based on altitude
- Paired with the compass for map orientation
- Integrated Google Maps functionality

**.. out of space, check "earthquest.site" ..**
nodes.short_description:
The ENTIRE Earth in True 3D, and every 360 on the planet - ( The Best 3D & Street View Quality on the Market )
———
for more info, see:
earthquest.site

nodes.long_description:
Quest 2 Game made in Unity with the Cesium Package using the Google Earth Photogrammetry 3d Tiles.

---------------------------------------------
UPDATE v10 !! : hopefully the MOST STABLE and the Update that Simplified the Flight Controlling Mechanic the Most, v10 is meant to finalize the heavy game development for a month or two, however, fixes and improvements will still come if there are any needs for it. this Update adds Controller SUPPORT!!! basically the rest is self explanatory, the update also fixes a bug that due to the collider removal and raycast to prevent going through mesh, even if the Earth's Mesh was not visible in Space, it was still there, so the raycast stopped Player Movement when trying to go down, this was Fortunately FIXED!,

v10.2: the Controllers are now Able to Type on Keyboard to Search and Teleport to a specific Place on Earth, and fixed a bug where the space bar touch collider was small,

v10.3: when you pressed on some specific ui buttons, the code gave an error and every other ui stopped working since they had the same script. this was fixed. 3d Earth Generation to have better quality and faster performance, also loading faster and in larger quantity, we'll have to know if that's the case, if not we'll have to redo the changes in v10.4 :/, another improvement was that flight speed adjustment based on altitude was not efficient, and sometimes caused teleporting instead of flying smoothly, fixed !
https://youtu.be/6s-jkai4_mA
---------------------
nodes.short_description: geography teaching hand tracking passthrough VR app/game on Quest 2 Quest Pro, and Quest 3

nodes.change_log:
v44.06 - v44.21 released 01/30/2025 - 02/24/2025 🌍🌐

# Updates ⬇️

- Improved Street View Navigation - 02/24/2025

- A new issue with the 3D map loading system could have caused a huge, random zone to NEVER load. -This should now be resolved.

- The crash issue should now be resolved! ⭐

- Zoom function for mini-map and enlarged map has received 3 new levels of zoom-out 🔥

- Possible slight overall performance improvement

- Fixed upside-down globe bug

- Now, when loading a 4K Street View as 8K, the system will automatically adjust itself to the supported resolution instead of treating it as an error and displaying "Image not found" 🥳

- Changing 3D Terrain settings will no longer trigger the 3D map to reload!

- Random 3D Destination feature should no longer include 2D areas, the number of places is still well over a thousand

- When enabled, Motion Sickness Vignette will now be used not just for flight, but also for turning with Hand Tracking!

- Fixed an issue with Autocompleted Location-Search becoming unresponsive

- The mini-map user marker’s orientation is now finally 100% accurate and no longer inconsistent at north and south angles. It is now based on the user’s ACTUAL headset orientation!

- Space > Earth and Earth > Space transitions are now 100% smooth, even with an off-centered play space!

- Fixed Foveated Rendering is now active at the smallest level, improving performance with no noticeable difference in visuals

- 4K Street View has been optimized for even smoother performance, and similarly to 8K Street View in the previous update, it is now mapped 100% seamlessly

- The “Search for Place” and Multiplayer Lobby keyboards are now very slightly closer to the user

- Many other improvements that aren’t too significant / I forgot about 😅

# Multiplayer ⬇️

- Fixed potential issues with avatar positioning

- Solved a potential bug with teleport buttons on weaker connectivity

- Updated avatar movement for smoothness even on extremely low connectivity (no more snappy movement on bad connection)

- Fixed some visual inconsistencies with avatars in space when viewing from Earth with Immersive Mode and Fog turned on

———

v44 is OUT!

# Bookmark Slot Renaming ⬇️

- You can now **rename** saved Bookmark Slots!

# Additional ⬇️

- Compass now visible (from underneath) on both sides, handy when looking up!

- Fixed Fog covering up the Sky in some weird scenarios, and other bugs

———

v43.5 is HERE!

# Mini-map Updates ⬇️

- Discover nearby Community Street Views, See Official Street View Coverage on a larger scale, and more with the new Street View Coverage Overlay Toggle!

- Improved user-marker design 🔺 

- Reengineered zooming: zoom motion is no longer linear and feels much more natural, and altitude-based auto zoom is more intuitive and responsive overall 🔎✨

- Added new zoom-in level, offering the ability to zoom closer in for even more details about your location 📍 

# Additional ⬇️

- Varied smaller improvements, UI refinements, and bug fixes

- Refined UI Color-Scheme, featuring a fresher, more “pearly” blue!

- Small optimizations for performance

———

Let me know if there are any issues, big OR small - ( contact.earthquest.site )
